de.adorsys.datasafe.directory.api.resource

Interface ResourceResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResourceResolverImpl, ResourceResolverImplRuntimeDelegatable

    public interface ResourceResolver
    Resolves user internal (logical, relative) resources into absolute (physical) locations then can be directly accessed using filesystem adapter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends ResourceLocation<T>>
      boolean      		 isAbsolute(T resource)
      Checks if a given resource location is absolute.
      AbsoluteLocation<PrivateResource> resolveRelativeToPrivate(UserIDAuth userID, PrivateResource resource)
      Resolves physical location of a given users' private resource (privatespace)
      AbsoluteLocation<PrivateResource> resolveRelativeToPrivateInbox(UserIDAuth userID, PrivateResource resource)
      Provides full access to users' INBOX by viewing it as privatespace
      AbsoluteLocation<PublicResource> resolveRelativeToPublicInbox(UserID userID, PublicResource resource)
      Resolves physical location of a given users' public resource (INBOX)

    • Method Detail

      • resolveRelativeToPublicInbox

        AbsoluteLocation<PublicResource> resolveRelativeToPublicInbox(UserID userID,
                                                              PublicResource resource)
        Resolves physical location of a given users' public resource (INBOX)
        Parameters:
        userID - INBOX owner
        resource - location within INBOX
        Returns:
        physical location of resource within users' INBOX

      • resolveRelativeToPrivateInbox

        AbsoluteLocation<PrivateResource> resolveRelativeToPrivateInbox(UserIDAuth userID,
                                                                PrivateResource resource)
        Provides full access to users' INBOX by viewing it as privatespace
        Parameters:
        userID - INBOX as privatespace owner
        resource - location within INBOX
        Returns:
        physical location of resource within users' INBOX seen as privatespace resource (with full control)

      • resolveRelativeToPrivate

        AbsoluteLocation<PrivateResource> resolveRelativeToPrivate(UserIDAuth userID,
                                                           PrivateResource resource)
        Resolves physical location of a given users' private resource (privatespace)
        Parameters:
        userID - Privatespace owner
        resource - location within privatespace
        Returns:
        physical location of resource within users' privatespace
